name: Square Catcher
description:
A Tetris inspired minimalistic game.

Use The Bucket to collect all'em raining squares!

Use W,D and the Left/Right Arrows to move The Bucket.

Press Z to eliminate all the squares insideThe Bucket and increase your score. 

The more squares you eliminate once at a time, the more your score increase.

Submitted to the 299th 1 Hour Game Jam (Although it took me 4.5 hours to finish lol), which theme was "Square"

The 1 Hour Game Jam happens weelky and you can participate in here:

https://onehourgamejam.com/
